member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.types
member.summary: ``<string>`` Table type (a controlled vocabulary) acceptable values

member.name: T:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json
member.summary:
##### The biom file format: Version 1.0
The ``biom`` format is based on ``JSON`` to provide the overall structure for the format. JSON is a widely supported format with native parsers available within many programming languages.

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.id
member.summary: ``<string or null>`` a field that can be used to id a table (or null)

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.comment
member.summary: ``<string>`` A free text field containing any information that you feel Is relevant (Or just feel Like sharing)

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.format
member.summary: ``<string>`` The name and version of the current biom format

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.format_url
member.summary: ``<url>`` A string with a static URL providing format details

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.type
member.summary:
``<string>`` Table type (a controlled vocabulary) Acceptable values :
+ "OTU table" + "Pathway table" + "Function table" + "Ortholog table" + "Gene table" + "Metabolite table" + "Taxon table"

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.generated_by
member.summary: ``<string>`` Package and revision that built the table

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.date
member.summary: ``<datetime>`` Date the table was built (ISO 8601 format)

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.matrix_type
member.summary:
``<string>`` Type of matrix data representation (a controlled vocabulary) Acceptable values :
+ "sparse" : only non-zero values are specified + "dense" : every element must be specified

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.matrix_element_type
member.summary:
Value type in matrix (a controlled vocabulary) Acceptable values :
+ "int" Integer + "float" : floating point + "unicode" : unicode string

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.shape
member.summary: ``<list of ints>``, the number of rows and number of columns in data

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.data
member.summary:
``<list of lists>``, counts of observations by sample
If matrix_type Is "sparse",
``` [[row, column, value], [row, column, value], ...] ```
If matrix_type Is "dense",
``` [[value, value, value, ...], [value, value, value, ...], ...] ```

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.rows
member.summary: ``<list of objects>`` An ORDERED list of obj describing the rows

member.name: P:SMRUCC.genomics.foundation.BIOM.v10.Json.columns
member.summary: ``<list of objects>`` An ORDERED list of obj describing the columns
